Format.description: (optional, string) Enter: xml, or json.  Default is set to xml.

NoHTML.description: (optional, integer) Enter 1 to remove HTML from text. Set only if Format=json.

NoRedirect.description: (optional, integer) Enter 1 to skip HTTP redirects.  This is useful for !bang commands. Set only if Format=json.

PrettyPrint.description: (optional, integer) Enter 1 to pretty-print the JSON output.

SkipDisambiguation.description: (optional, integer) Enter 1 to skip disambiguation. Set only if Format=json.

Response.description: The response from DuckDuckGo in XML or JSON format.
